TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void EventHandler<TEventArgs>(object sender, TEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed EventHandler`1<TEventArgs> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub EventHandler(Of TEventArgs)(sender As Object, e As TEventArgs)
generic <typename TEventArgs> public delegate void EventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, TEventArgs e);
type EventHandler<'EventArgs> = delegate of obj * 'EventArgs -> unit

typeparam.name: TEventArgs
typeparam.span: 該事件所產生事件資料的類型。

span.span: The type of the event data generated by the event.
An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 代表這個事件提供資料時將處理事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle an event when the event provides data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 中的事件模型根據具有與其處理常式連接事件的事件委派。The event model in the .NET Framework is based on having an event delegate that connects an event with its handler. 若要引發事件，需要兩個項目：To raise an event, two elements are needed: - 委派，它是指提供為了回應事件的方法。A delegate that refers to a method that provides the response to the event. - （選擇性） 如果此事件提供資料保留事件資料的類別。Optionally, a class that holds the event data, if the event provides data. 委派是可定義簽章，也就是傳回值類型和方法的參數清單類型的類型。The delegate is a type that defines a signature, that is, the return value type and parameter list types for a method. 您可以使用委派類型來宣告變數可以參考任何具有相同的簽章與委派的方法。You can use the delegate type to declare a variable that can refer to any method with the same signature as the delegate. 標準事件處理常式委派的簽章定義沒有傳回值的方法。The standard signature of an event handler delegate defines a method that does not return a value. 這個方法的第一個參數的類型是和參考引發事件的執行個體。This method's first parameter is of type and refers to the instance that raises the event. 其第二個參數衍生自類型和保留事件資料。Its second parameter is derived from type and holds the event data. 如果事件不會產生事件資料，第二個參數是只值欄位。If the event does not generate event data, the second parameter is simply the value of the field. 否則，第二個參數都是衍生自，並提供任何欄位或屬性需要保存事件資料。Otherwise, the second parameter is a type derived from and supplies any fields or properties needed to hold the event data. 委派是預先定義的委派，表示所產生的資料事件的事件處理常式方法。The delegate is a predefined delegate that represents an event handler method for an event that generates data. 使用的優點是您不需要程式碼您自己的自訂委派，如果您的事件產生的事件資料。The advantage of using is that you do not need to code your own custom delegate if your event generates event data. 您只需要做為泛型參數提供事件資料物件的類型。You simply provide the type of the event data object as the generic parameter. 若要處理事件的方法與關聯事件，加入事件委派的執行個體。To associate the event with the method that will handle the event, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會示範名為事件`ThresholdReached`。The following example shows an event named `ThresholdReached`. 此事件相關聯委派。The event is associated with an delegate. [!code-cpp[EventsOverview#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventsoverview/cpp/programwithdata.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventsOverview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventsoverview/cs/programwithdata.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventsOverview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventsoverview/vb/module1withdata.vb#6)]
